EmailTemplate.name: 2018_04_C&PS_CSM Emails.Duckworth_April 30
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Customer Connect
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell Customer Connect
Dear Honeywell Customer:
I’m Mark Duckworth, your Customer Support Manager, and I would like to share with you news and information to help you get the most out of your Honeywell products and services. We value your feedback and are working hard to respond and address it so that we can further improve. New E-signature Process Reduces Wait Time For Rental Bank Transactions With digital signature software, you can sign engine or auxiliary power unit (APU) bailment agreements online, anywhere in the world, with nothing to download or install.
Honeywell’s Americas Global Customer Committee Met in April The members of the Global Customer Committee met in April to share ideas, address actions, engage in broad discussions and exchange ideas on how to improve our customers’ operations.
Upcoming Operators Conferences Operators Conferences are being scheduled in all regions - join us to learn more about Honeywell products and services that are critical to your flight department.
READ MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018_04_CPS_CSMEmails_LandingPAge.html]]> If you need additional customer support, I am your point of contact. Please reach me at:
Mark Duckworth Direct: 602-794-8224 Mobile: 602-284-8065 Email: Mark.Duckworth@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Mark.Duckworth@Honeywell.com]]>
